lenders.loan_because: it is not mine, but flows to me and thus through me.
lenders.occupational_info: scattering seeds for Jesus.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to, why else?
lenders.occupational_info: Science

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web-sites.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: Nicholas Kristoff made it sound like the right way help empower women around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from state government.  Now I help with grandchildren and elderly parents.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I am an American student studying agriculture.  I want to own a small farm when I am older so I can grow healthy food for my family and my neighbors.  I understand the troubles of a small farmer and I want to help my brothers and sisters around the world.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can and we all should

lenders.name: Debby
lenders.loan_because: I like to see constructive use of donations, empowerment at local level and to encourage entrepreneurial spirit and self sufficiency - hopefully without the distorted westernised way of greed.  Having a support network of help is vital, my way of giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: My business works at the heart of climate change - mostly in technology innovation.  We help provide the people who push the low carbon agenda and deliver renewable energy, cleantech and carbon management projects around the globe.  Its my passion.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Taral
lenders.loan_because: every seed needs a little water to grow. From there, the potential is endless.....

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell things that make people's lives easier, more organized, and help them save money.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: its an investment to bless others despite our very own circumstance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom of three children and a believer in the goodness and faithfulness of God.

lenders.name: Debra J
lenders.loan_because: Seven years ago, I started my own business. For the first 4 years, I worked hard, but I made no profits. Fortunately, the last 3 years have been successful for me, and I want to offer a helping hand to others who want to be independent and productive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work one-to-one with teenagers and adults who are having problems at school or on the job. Most of my clients have been diagnosed with learning disorders and need special help. I also give speeches and write articles/books about education.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: it is within my means.
lenders.occupational_info: I help rehabilitate sick and injured stray animals.

lenders.name: Jeroen
lenders.loan_because: it's cool

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe that one person CAN make a difference and we can all make a difference one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist businesses in the energy sector to craft deals that include mergers and acquistions, buyouts, investment funding and more. Our focus is sustainability and renewables.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: it impacts the places i can not touch. It educates the children that define our future.
lenders.occupational_info: Creating technologies that bring together people and resources while helping to support nonprofits.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
Similar to many other people I am no longer making loans at this time, because of the issue of Kiva's policy with respect to loans which support cockfighting. 

I am hopeful though that through discussion, debate, and public feedback the issue will be in a more consistent state. 

My work on this issue can be found at the following pages: 

http://www.dkfriedman.name/kiva_cockfighting_loans.php

and:

http://kaclwiki.org/
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a teacher and also as a computer programmer.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I recognize the broader impact that money that would sit idle in my bank account can have on the lives of others less fortunate than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a student at Case Western Reserve University

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.occupation: Communicator/Author/Trainer focusing on Macintosh, Web, tech
lenders.loan_because: I believe the world should be a better place for each of us having been in it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach efficient use of Macintosh and iOS to help people accomplish their goals. When people need to find the right written words, I listen and help them compose those words. After years of staying put, I am now traveling full time, looking for ways to contribute to the world and earn my own living as I experience the world some more.

lenders.name: Sandigan
lenders.loan_because: I needed a sufficient capital for my rental/leasing business in naga city, philippines. Right I have a small sari-sari store.
lenders.occupational_info: It is very profitable if i can raise a capital since in Naga City ,Philippines people here are so business minded and they  really need a space for rent for their business.

lenders.name: shona
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled to find such a site. I respect the entrepreneurs of this world and am blessed to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist working in oil, watercolour and pastel.  I paint mainly wildlife but also some portraits and landscapes.

lenders.name: Rowan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lenders.name: Nathaniel
lenders.occupational_info: Casino Walk gives you a taste of the casino life by walking you through the different casino games. Many people put their focus only on poker games, but there is so much more to the casinos than just poker tables and poker hands, and so we here at Casino Walk want to give you that. Different games are tackled – from the source of majority of the income of casinos, the slot machines, to the table games, and other card games that are played inside casinos. Information on how these games work and on how you can make the most out of your playing experience is also given so that you can enjoy your next trip to the casino.

lenders.name: Mattias
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Katja
lenders.loan_because: Because it makes so much more sense to give a Kiva gift certificate to friends and family  than yet another birthday or Christmas present, that they don't really need...

lenders.name: Karena
lenders.loan_because: the best way for individuals to break the cycle of poverty is through empowering them to change their own lives. Kiva allows this to happen!

lenders.name: HGT 10b
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because it’s a great matter to encourage a person who usually does not have the chance to change their life on their own.
These people who apply for a credit are often families with children, who can’t go to school, have not enough to eat or to drink and live in slums. We hope to help them to get out of their bad situation and start a new life.We like the idea of support to self-help. And we think it’s ignorant and just not right to say “it’s not my problem so who cares?”

lenders.name: MARTIN
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help others willing to work so hard to survive. The least I could do is help a bit.

lenders.name: Clea
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Kiva and micro-finance for women and the ability to assist families in developing countries and their greater communities. I also believe in sponsoring entrepreneurialism no matter how small the endeavour!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a personal trainer and health coach based in Sydney, Australia. I am the founder and owner of Goddess Fitness Online.

lenders.name: Ernesto
lenders.loan_because: because I have to add more computer units that can accommodate more web marketing projects and additional staff (working students) to work as part or full-timers.
lenders.occupational_info: The nature of our business involves marketing websites and social promotions to drive traffic to that particular site we are promoting. 10% of the proceeds goes to "Adopt a School Program" to help upgrade facilities of old public schools.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.occupation: I am a mommy of three
lenders.loan_because: becuase I know some day I will need help
lenders.occupational_info: I am  just able to help as much as I can.
